SELECT (count(sc.id_suscription)::float)/(select count(sc1.id_suscription) from suscription_customer sc1) as count_suscription, sc.id_suscription , s.suscription_name FROM suscription_customer sc join suscription s on sc.id_suscription = s.suscription_id GROUP BY sc.id_suscription, s.suscription_name #WHERE#

SELECT (count(*)::float)/(select count(*) from menu_customer mc3) as count_category , mcc.menu_name_category FROM menu_customer mc join menu m on mc.id_menu = m.menu_id join menu_category mcc on m.menu_category_id = mcc.id_menu_category where m.menu_category_id = 3 group by mcc.menu_name_category union SELECT (count(*)::float)/(select count(*) from menu_customer mc3) , mcc.menu_name_category FROM menu_customer mc join menu m on mc.id_menu = m.menu_id join menu_category mcc on m.menu_category_id = mcc.id_menu_category where m.menu_category_id = 2 group by mcc.menu_name_category union SELECT (count(*)::float)/(select count(*) from menu_customer mc3) , mcc.menu_name_category FROM menu_customer mc join menu m on mc.id_menu = m.menu_id join menu_category mcc on m.menu_category_id = mcc.id_menu_category where m.menu_category_id = 1 group by mcc.menu_name_category

SELECT count(*) as cuenta, mcc.menu_name_category FROM menu_customer mc join menu m on mc.id_menu = m.menu_id join menu_category mcc on m.menu_category_id = mcc.id_menu_category join suscription_customer sc on sc.suscription_customer_id = mc.id_suscription_customer #WHERE# group by mcc.menu_name_category

SELECT #COLUMNS# FROM suscription_customer sc JOIN menu_customer mc ON sc.suscription_customer_id = mc.id_suscription_customer JOIN menu m ON mc.id_menu = m.menu_id JOIN product pp ON m.first_plate = pp.product_id JOIN product ps ON m.second_plate = ps.product_id JOIN product po ON m.dessert = po.product_id #WHERE#
